description.ru: - Поддержка Thunderbird (частичная) - Установка новых параметров прямо из окна "Смена мастер-пароля" - Иконки на панели инструментов и statusbar, а также в меню. - Иконки показывают текущее состояние модуля защиты: открыт, закрыт или не защищён. - Возможность управлять показом иконок - Возможность управлять отсчётом автоматически закрытием модуля защиты - Горячие кнопки для закрытия/открытия модуля защиты (ALT + L) - Быстрый доступ к панели управления - через правую кнопку мыши на иконке или в мену инструментов - Возможность запроса ввода мастер-пароля при запуске браузера. (Это также может быть использовано как обход Bug 536140 из-за которого возможен показ несколько запросов одновременно). - Возможность блокировки всех или дополнительных запросов ввода мастер-пароль (Замечание: когда запросы автоматически блокируются, то это равносильно если бы пользователь сам нажал на кнопку "отмена", так что - это может привести к не неожиданным результатам)
description.en-US:
The death of this addon and countless others (ultimately Firefox itself as we know it). This addon is not and never will be compatible with Firefox 57 and beyond, however it will remain compatible with Waterfox and Palemoon as long as they support XUL "Legacy" extensions. It might still run if you enable extensions.legacy.enabled in about:config Features:
  • Ability to enable or disable timeout
  • Toolbar, addressbar and statusbar icons
  • Icons are dynamic and represent current state of master password, such as locked/unlocked or unset
  • Options to hide the icons and/or menu items
  • Set options directly from "Change Master Password" window
  • Lock application on demand or with timer
  • Two different timers for logout and lock
  • Hotkey to logout/login master security device (default: ALT + L)
  • Hotkey to lock application and/or individual windows (default: ALT + SHIFT + L and CTRL + ALT + SHIFT + L)
  • Easy access to options or set/change master password via right click on toolbar/statusbar icons or tools menu
  • Option to prompt master password on startup (work around for Bug 536140 which prompts multiple times for master password on startup).
  • Option to suppress all or duplicate master password prompt popups (added in v1.2.20101212) (Note: when prompts are suppressed, they are actually being canceled. This means whatever requested master password will be notified as if user canceled the prompt, this might bring unexpected results.)
  • Temporary suppress MP prompts
  • Audio and icon blinking notifications when MP prompt was suppressed
  • Notification bar when MP suppressed
  • Lock application after NN incorrect entered passwords
  • Logout / lock application (or single window) on minimize
  • Support for Thunderbird
NOTE There is a little inconvenience if MP+ set to block master password prompts - it will block them by canceling them before they appear on screen. Because of that if you open a web page that has login/autofill form and required master password, you'll need manually login via MP+ and refresh the page to get the available login information for the login/autofill form. The same thing applied to any other extensions, option windows, etc that use protect by master password data - if it's a window, you'll need reopen the window after you manually logged in with master password. Disclaimer This addon is not a replacement for built-in master password, it's an enhancement for it. It also cannot guarantee total protection, simply because anyone can disable it even without starting the browser. Disabling or uninstalling this addon will NOT delete your master password! You can find more about master password http://kb.mozillazine.org/Master_password Please report bugs and feature requests at Support website or via email in the support section of addon page (https://addons.thunderbird.net/addon/master-password) Bug reports or feature requests posted in review sections will be ignored and may be reported as spam. Please test beta versions if available from here This will help speed up releasing final versions. (note currently if beta version installed, you'll need manually install final version when it's released, automatic updates will only install beta versions (thanks AMO for that nonsense)
description.zh-CN:
本扩展为内建的主密码界面添加了以下新功能和改进的功能：
-  允许启动或禁用自动锁定超时时限
-  直接在"修改主密码"窗口中设置扩展选项
-  添加工具栏、地址栏和状态栏图标
-  允许隐藏扩展的图标和菜单项
-  超时计时器的设置可以忽略用户的活动（即使用户正在操作计时器也不会重置）
-  通过热键锁定/解锁 (ALT + L)
-  通过菜单或右键点击工具栏/状态栏图标便捷地访问选项和设置/修改主密码
-  添加浏览器启动时提示输入主密码的有关选项（解决了 Bug 536140 中浏览器启动时多次弹出主密码输入提示的问题） 
-  添加阻止弹出全部或重复的主密码输入提示窗口的有关选项（v1.2.20101212 版本时加入）（注意：这里说的阻止实际是表示取消提示。这就意味着所有在需要输入主密码的场合浏览器都会被告知是用户自行取消该提示，这可能会产生一些未知的问题。）
-  阻止主密码输入提示时闪烁图标、播放声音或显示通知栏
-  支持 Thunderbird（仅仅部分支持，需要进行更多的测试）

developer_comments.en-US: Due to lack of free time and Mozilla's new strategy with frequent major version releases I no longer will support old version of FF and TB, only current versions will be used for testings. Change log legend: + Added ! Fixed * Changed - Removed

caption.en-US: Icons on toolbar, status bar, address bar, right click menu, counter in tooltip, notification bar when master password prompt was blocked.
Additional options in "Change Master Password" window
Remove button in "Change Master Password" window
Master Password prompt with keyboard language and non-latin warning indicator activated (by default enabled only in fullscreen mode)
Locked individual window in Firefox v3.6

1) Browser is locked. Click the icon to unlock it with master password.
2) Browser is unlocked. Click to lock it up.
3) No master password is set. Click to set master password.
4) Master password prompt popup was suppressed

summary.ru:
- Закрывает Модуль защиты после заданного времени, нажатием иконки или нажатием горячих кнопок (ALT + L)
- Запрашивает ввести мастер-пароль при запуске браузера
- Блокирует окна запросов ввода мастер-пароля (всех или дополнительных)
summary.en-US:
Various enhancements for build-in "master password" (MP)
-Locks master security device on demand or after specified time
-Prompts for MP on browser startup
-Suppresses all or duplicate MP prompts
-Locks up entire application or individual windows
summary.zh-CN:
以多种方式增强"主密码"的功能
-  到达指定时间后、点击状态栏/工具栏按钮或按下热键 (ALT+L) 锁定主安全设备
-  浏览器启动时提示输入主密码
-  阻止弹出全部或重复的主密码输入提示
